meta.title: Casimir Engineering - Swiss Robotics & Electronics Consultancy
meta.description: Swiss engineering consultancy specializing in robotics, electronics, and test bench automation. From prototype to mass production - based in Lausanne, Switzerland.
meta.keywords: engineering consultancy, robotics, electronics, test benches, Switzerland, Lausanne, product development, industrialization, embedded systems, UAV, drone, PCB design, hardware development, mechatronics, prototype, mass production, manufacturing, automation, validation, firmware, sensors, defence, radar, medical devices, IoT

hero.title: Let's build it together.
hero.subtitle: From prototype to mass production - robotics, electronics, and test benches.
hero.intro:
We are a Swiss engineering consultancy.
We help companies transform ideas into physical products with a focus on robust industrialization and automated test infrastructure.

From military radars to consumer electronics, we provide end-to-end engineering support thanks to a network of engineers and industrial partners.
hero.location: Based in Lausanne, Switzerland. Working with partners in Switzerland, France, the UK and China.

product.title: End-to-end product development
product.desc: Concept exploration, system architecture, and design. From initial requirements to manufacturing at scale, we guide projects through the complete development cycle with a pragmatic, manufacturing-aware approach.

electronics.title: Electronics & embedded systems
electronics.desc: PCB design, embedded software development, power systems, and sensor integration. Experience with electronics for robotics, UAVs, and industrial applications.

robotics.title: Robotics & mechatronics
robotics.desc: UAV systems, XYZ systems, actuators selection, and multi-sensor integration. Expertise in autonomous systems and real-time control architectures.

testbench.title: Test bench design & automation
testbench.desc: Custom test benches for electronics and robotics validation. TofuPilot is our preferred open-source test engine and analytics platform.

industrial.title: Industrialization & manufacturing
industrial.desc: Design for manufacturing (DFM), validation planning, certification support, and production ramp-up. Navigate the transition from prototype to mass production with experienced guidance.

network.title: Global manufacturing network
network.desc: Coordination with manufacturing partners in Switzerland, France, the UK, and southern China. Access to diverse capabilities from precision Swiss manufacturing to high-volume Chinese production.

communication.title: Training & communication
communication.desc: Technical training, investor presentations, and customer demonstrations. Clear communication of complex engineering concepts to diverse audiences.

uav.title: Professional and military UAV Test Benches
uav.desc: Designed, deployed and managed production test benches for professional mapping UAVs.
uav.keywords: UAV, drone, test benches, automation, validation

elec.title: R&D & Industrialization for airborne medical container
elec.desc: Electronics R&D, fault investigation of existing systems, subcontractor management, industrialization and production management, customer demonstrations.

radar.title: Automated Test Systems for Military Radar
radar.desc: Developed automated performance test systems for military radar platforms.
radar.keywords: Military, radar, defence, embedded, MATLAB, automation

devrel.title: Full stack IOT device development
devrel.desc: Complete development from idea to small series production of an IOT device.
devrel.scope: Product design, circuit board design, prototyping, small batch production

cubesat.title: Project coordination for CubeSat development
cubesat.desc: Team coordination for CubeSat development, systems integration
cubesat.keywords: CubeSat, team management, PCB design, space

discover.title: Discover
discover.desc: Clarify requirements, technical constraints, and success metrics. Understand market context, regulatory requirements, and manufacturing constraints early to guide design decisions.

prototype.title: Prototype
prototype.desc: Rapid iteration on electronics, mechanics, and firmware. Build functional prototypes to validate concepts, test performance, and identify integration challenges before committing to production design.

validate.title: Validate & Test
validate.desc: Design custom test benches, develop validation plans, and implement data capture systems. Establish repeatable test procedures that can transition to production quality control.

industrial.title: Industrialize
industrial.desc: Design for manufacturing (DFM) review, partner selection, and production ramp-up support. Work with manufacturing partners to ensure smooth transition from prototype to mass production.

support.title: Support
support.desc: Long-term maintenance of test infrastructure, design updates, and production support. Ensure test benches remain calibrated and validated throughout product lifecycle.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: Whether you want to develop a new product or unblock your production, let's have a call. Or an email.
